Detailed Description

Main structure for manipulating interrupts.

Field Documentation

uint64_t cvmx_interrupt::data

Internal use.

Don't touch in user code.

cvmx_interrupt_func_t cvmx_interrupt::handler

Set by user code, the handler function for the interrupt.

struct cvmx_interrupt* cvmx_interrupt::l [read]

Internal use.

Don't touch in user code.

uint64_t cvmx_interrupt::level_trigged

Set by user code, Must be '1' for level triggered sources.

void(* cvmx_interrupt::mask)(struct cvmx_interrupt *self)

Set by cvmx_interrupt_register() called by user code to mask the interrupt.

Set by cvmx_interrupt_register() called by user code to mask the interrupt.

Set by user code.

Set by cvmx_interrupt_register() called by user code to unmask the interrupt.
